channel.title: Different OS Webclient

item.title: Different OS Webclient
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:4, topic:393378”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=490546.msg3587881#msg3587881 date=1304337952]

Okay, so I made this in signlink public static final String findcachedir(){ return String.format("%s/%s/", System.getProperty("user.home"), ".SageScape_file_store_32"); }
How would I make this work image = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(".SageScape_file_store_32/Skill/"+s+".png");
How would I make it work for every other file I have? What do I put?

signlink.findcachedir() + “Skill/” + s + “.png”

I already got it, and there was no need for the signlink. But, I get a start up error after I did that.
[/quote]

An error that says…[/quote]
Uh: brandon@brandon-ET1331G:~/Desktop/Documents/client$ java client File could not be found. Error: loaderror Starting up 20
EDIT:Client files(without cache): http://sagescapepk.com/ipb/client.rar These are the files I’m trying to get to work on different OS.

Read full topic
